content:
Space Marines are amongst the deadliest warriors in the
galaxy, and they have learned how best to place their blows
for maximum effect. When taking the All-Out Attack action,
a Space Marine may spend a Fate Point (before rolling the
dice) to make his melee attacks for that round impossible
to parry or dodge.
